title: [K-12] Social Network-Based Collaborative Learning Design Workshop in Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic online tools and experience in higher education administration
context.additional_context: Conducted in an offline environment with provided digital devices (tablets, laptops). Learners include general citizens, with primary targets being education professionals with advanced expertise in social sectors

learning_goals: Design three or more collaborative learning environments utilizing social network tools
Accurately explain 70% or more of the technical and organizational procedures required to establish an online community of practice
Analyze advantages and disadvantages of social network utilization in higher education contexts with case-based evidence
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
